name: Can You Do It VR
description:
Note: Compatible with Oculus Quest 1/2 only. Virtual Reality Game

Can You Do It is the epic experience of Virtual Reality Technology?

Experience and play with hang gliding, city crossing, ladder climbing, zip-lining, Elevator failure, and many more coming soon in an update.

Can you do it? If Yes then don't release the grab button during play else you might fall down.

Experience city from the top of the sky by doing Hang Gliding, Feel real - Climb the ladder and cross the road with rope, like a real experience.
